reviews.review: Great lecturer with clear explanations. Assignments were challenging but fair.

reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.review: Engaging lectures and helpful during office hours.

reviews.review: Decent professor, but her grading is very strict.
